briefTitle: Clinical Study on Adjuvant Therapy of TQB3616 Combined With Endocrine Therapy Compared With Placebo Combined With Endocrine Therapy in Patients With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-controlled Phase III Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of TQB3616 Combined With Endocrine Therapy Versus Placebo Combined With Endocrine Therapy in Hormone Receptors (HR)-Positive and Human Epidermal GrowthFactor Receptor-2 (HER2) -Negative Breast Cancer Adjuvant Therapy
